name: Bouncy Pixel
description:
Fast, colorful, simple and addictive : Bouncy pixel is a 2D pixel game easy to play, hard to master.
Throw your ball and try to touch every pixels spots with it.
Throw the ball and try to beat your highscore !

Features :
  • Air Hockey gameplay
  • Endless free game
  • Pixel Art Design

[HOW TO PLAY]

Drag the ball on the right direction to touch all the pixels spots.

Music : Eric SKIFF RESISTOR ANTHEMS
This album is freely available under a creative commons license

Have fun and thank you for playing Bouncy Pixel
